Articles.Content:
ALL YOU NEED TO KNOW!

So since the last one was wiped; This is the new thread.

I'm making this quick thread just to let you guys know that this update is still around.

Everything works. Landing gear, steering, lights and the autostruts.

OLD VIDEO DEMONSTRATION:

Here's a video showing what this mod is; If you are unfamiliar with it:

I am working on a new version that includes all the required plugins.

FINALLY THE DOWNLOAD: http://www./download.php?mh9d8hw6rab66bq

INSTALLATION:

Simply copy the corrosponding folders into your kerbal istallation.

For steam users this will be: C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program

IN CASE OF LAG:

IF you get lag after placing a few float pairs, try removing some and placing them manually.

It is a known problem that too many autostruts causes lag.

LICENCE AND DISCLAIMER:

The Vanguard Plugin is distributed with Kreuzung's permission; and Bobcat Cart Legacy under a creative commons License.

I do not own any of the content in this pack, I merely adapted Tosh's mod to function with the afforementioned plugins with all neccesary permissions.

Edited April 28, 2013 by Asmosdeus
Sweet. I await this mod, for it made designing MANY things fun. xP
You forgot the most important thing : download link

There's a download link included with the video.

Not sure if it's up to date, but worth a shot, I'd say.

There is no download because the forum post of a required plugin got deleted, thankfully I had a copy on my computer but I need the mod developers permission to redistribute it with this mod.

With any luck, the download will be up by the end of the day.

GOOD NEWS!

Because bobcat's legacy cart plugin is distributed under a creative-commons licence, I can include the package so long as I credit him!
Hmm, I have been using the pre release of the Firespitter floats. I'll have to try both the revival amd the recreation and see which works best for me. I sure am glad we have floats again!

Oh cool, more are in the works?

I'll try to keep these ones alive just in case there are people who prefer them
